titles.title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on February 11, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Elects Members to the following House Committees: (1) Budget; (2) Education and the Workforce; (3) Science; (4) Small Business; and (5) Standards of Official Conduct.
